subject: fix: always show install button, hide debug pill when no errors
body:
Install button was conditional on beforeinstallprompt (Chromium-only),
so Safari/Firefox users never saw it. Now always visible in header â€”
triggers native prompt on Chromium, falls back to Settings pane with
browser-specific instructions. Hidden only in standalone PWA mode.

Debug "0 errors" pill confused users (non-interactive). Banner now
hidden when clean, only appears when actual errors occur.
